channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 16:48 Air alarm to Kharkiv Oblast Watch Further Messages.
item.description: 🔴 16:48 Air alarm to Kharkiv Oblast Watch Further Messages.#Kharkiv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 16:42 Drawing of anxiety in Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lapetskaya Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 16:42 Drawing of anxiety in Kharkiv region.
